00013     CompNeoHookean(Real Lambda, Real Mu): _lambda(Lambda), _mu(Mu) {};
00014     CompNeoHookean(CompNeoHookean* BaseMaterial): 
00015       _lambda(BaseMaterial->_lambda), _mu(BaseMaterial->_mu) {};
00016 
00017     // Clone
00018     virtual CompNeoHookean* clone() const {
00019       return new CompNeoHookean(*this);
00020     }
00021       
00022     // Default copy constructor (compiler should already provide exactly this)
00023     CompNeoHookean(const CompNeoHookean & Old): 
00024     _lambda(Old._lambda), _mu(Old._mu) {};
00025 
00026     Real getLambda() {return _lambda;};
00027     Real getMu() {return _mu;};
00028     void setLambda(Real Lambda) {_lambda = Lambda;};
00029     void setMu(Real Mu) {_mu = Mu;};
00030     void setLameConstFromEnu(Real E, Real nu) {
00031       _lambda = nu*E/((1.0+nu)*(1.0-2.0*nu)); 
00032       _mu = 0.5*E/(1.0+nu);
00033     }
00034 
00035     void setMaterialParameters(vector<Real > & LambdaMu) {
00036       _lambda = LambdaMu[0];
00037       _mu = LambdaMu[1];
00038     }
00039     
00040     // Operators
00042     void compute(FKresults & R, const Matrix3d & F);
00043 
00045     // It is used in the Model derived classes
00046     bool HasHistoryVariables() { return false; };
00047     
00048   private:
00049  // Constructors/destructors:
00050     PointLoad(): _force(0.0), _mu(1.0) {};
00052     Real _lambda;
00053     Real _mu;
